#
# To build xerces and xalan for linux:
#
mkdir $(HOME)/source/xml-xerces-xalan # Then move tars and makefile to $(HOME)/source/xml-xerces-xalan
cd $(HOME)/source/xml-xerces-xalan
make extract-xerces
make config-xerces
make build-xerces
make install-xerces # Goes to $(HOME)/build/xml-xerces-xalan/linux/c/lib
make extract-xalan
make config-xalan
make build-xalan
make install-xalan # Goes to $(HOME)/build/xml-xerces-xalan/linux/c/lib
